Active Skill.Name: Glacier Incursion
Active Skill.Description: Inflicts Physical Damage (Damage Rate 120%/160%/200%/240%/280%/320%/360%/400%) on a target enemy row, reducing its Physical Defence by 10.5%/14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%/31.5%/35%, and has a 55% chance of Suffocating them, inflicting Physical Damage (Damage Rate 90%/120%/150%/180%/210%/240%/270%/300%) on them every 3s for 6s.
